Package com.example.luckydragon.Fragments

Class OrganizerEventFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.luckydragon.Fragments.OrganizerEventFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class OrganizerEventFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
This is the fragment containing the organizer-specific event info. Displays the different lists of entrants (waiting list, attendees list, etc). ISSUES:

    • updateAdapter

      private void updateAdapter(EntrantArrayAdapter adapter, android.widget.ListView listView, String listType)
      Given an adapter, its listView, and the type of list, updates the adapter to store the current users that are in the listType for this event.
      Parameters:
      adapter - the adapter for the listView
      listView - the corresponding listView
      listType - the type of list, can be one of: <attendee|wait|invitee|cancelled>list
